title: Myanmar’s Junta Killed My Husband. It Can’t Break Our Will.
description: Myanmar’s people have come too far to give up their freedom.
dc:creator: Nilar Thein
category: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat

media:content.media:credit: Soe Than Win/Agence France-Presse — Getty Images
media:content.media:description: U Kyaw Min Yu, his wife, Daw Nilar Thein, and their daughter the couple’s release from prison in Yangon, Myanmar, in January 2012.
